title: ECE Create-X Capstone Design
description: A single-semester ECE culminating design experience in which interdisciplinary teams propose, prototype, test, demonstrate, formally present, and document projects incorporating engineering standards and realistic constraints.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3011 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and ECE 3005 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
